name: Connect 4 (itch) (HighPixelLabs)
description:
#1GAD

I wanted to try to make a small game in 1 day so I decided to make Connect 4. This is my first game outside of Unity Engine in awhile. The game was made using C++. This was fun and I enjoyed working on it. Any feedback or suggestions would be great. Code is open source so you can tinker with it as much as you like.
